targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp_rilevamento
FROM rilevamento ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', timestamp_rilevamento) +
    (extract(minute from timestamp_rilevamento)::int / 15) * interval '15 minutes' AS intervallo_15min,
    MAX(watt_rilevati) AS max_watt,
    MIN(watt_rilevati) AS min_watt,
    AVG(watt_rilevati) AS media_watt
FROM
    Rilevamento
GROUP BY
    intervallo_15min
ORDER BY
    intervallo_15min

SELECT
  ROUND(watt_rilevati::NUMERIC / 1000, 3) AS potenza_ultima_kw
FROM
  rilevamento
ORDER BY
  timestamp_rilevamento DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento,
  r1.watt_rilevati AS "Ufficio 1",
  r2.watt_rilevati AS "Magazzino",
  r3.watt_rilevati AS "Laboratorio"
FROM
  Rilevamento r1
JOIN
  Sensore s1 ON r1.codice_sensore = s1.id_sensore AND s1.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Ufficio 1'
JOIN
  Rilevamento r2 ON r1.timestamp_rilevamento = r2.timestamp_rilevamento
JOIN
  Sensore s2 ON r2.codice_sensore = s2.id_sensore AND s2.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Magazzino'
JOIN
  Rilevamento r3 ON r1.timestamp_rilevamento = r3.timestamp_rilevamento
JOIN
  Sensore s3 ON r3.codice_sensore = s3.id_sensore AND s3.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Laboratorio'
WHERE
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento >= now() - interval '2 days'
ORDER BY
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento;

SELECT
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento,
  r1.ampere_rilevati AS "Ufficio 1",
  r2.ampere_rilevati AS "Magazzino",
  r3.ampere_rilevati AS "Laboratorio"
FROM
  Rilevamento r1
JOIN
  Sensore s1 ON r1.codice_sensore = s1.id_sensore AND s1.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Ufficio 1'
JOIN
  Rilevamento r2 ON r1.timestamp_rilevamento = r2.timestamp_rilevamento
JOIN
  Sensore s2 ON r2.codice_sensore = s2.id_sensore AND s2.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Magazzino'
JOIN
  Rilevamento r3 ON r1.timestamp_rilevamento = r3.timestamp_rilevamento
JOIN
  Sensore s3 ON r3.codice_sensore = s3.id_sensore AND s3.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Laboratorio'
WHERE
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento >= now() - interval '2 days'
ORDER BY
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento;

SELECT
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento,
  r1.volt_rilevati AS "Ufficio 1",
  r2.volt_rilevati AS "Magazzino",
  r3.volt_rilevati AS "Laboratorio"
FROM
  Rilevamento r1
JOIN
  Sensore s1 ON r1.codice_sensore = s1.id_sensore AND s1.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Ufficio 1'
JOIN
  Rilevamento r2 ON r1.timestamp_rilevamento = r2.timestamp_rilevamento
JOIN
  Sensore s2 ON r2.codice_sensore = s2.id_sensore AND s2.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Magazzino'
JOIN
  Rilevamento r3 ON r1.timestamp_rilevamento = r3.timestamp_rilevamento
JOIN
  Sensore s3 ON r3.codice_sensore = s3.id_sensore AND s3.nome_sensore = 'Sensore Elettricità Laboratorio'
WHERE
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento >= now() - interval '2 days'
ORDER BY
  r1.timestamp_rilevamento;

WITH ultimo AS (
  SELECT MAX(timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_max FROM Rilevamento
),
dati AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento,
    watt_rilevati,
    LEAD(timestamp_rilevamento) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_next,
    LEAD(watt_rilevati) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS watt_next,
    (SELECT ts_max FROM ultimo) AS ts_max
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE timestamp_rilevamento >= (SELECT ts_max FROM ultimo) - INTERVAL '2 days'
)
SELECT
  ROUND(
    SUM(
      (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ts_next - timestamp_rilevamento)) / 3600)
      * ((watt_rilevati + watt_next) / 2) / 1000
    )::NUMERIC, 3) AS kWh_oggi
FROM dati
WHERE ts_next IS NOT NULL
  AND timestamp_rilevamento >= date_trunc('day', (SELECT ts_max FROM ultimo));

WITH ultimo AS (
  SELECT MAX(timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_max FROM Rilevamento
),
dati AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento,
    watt_rilevati,
    LEAD(timestamp_rilevamento) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_next,
    LEAD(watt_rilevati) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS watt_next
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE timestamp_rilevamento >= date_trunc('day', (SELECT ts_max FROM ultimo))
    AND timestamp_rilevamento < date_trunc('day', (SELECT ts_max FROM ultimo)) + INTERVAL '1 day'
),
consumo_orario AS (
  SELECT
    TO_CHAR(timestamp_rilevamento, 'HH24') AS ora,
    (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ts_next - timestamp_rilevamento)) / 3600)
    * ((watt_rilevati + watt_next) / 2) / 1000 AS kWh
  FROM dati
  WHERE ts_next IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  ora,
  ROUND(SUM(kWh)::numeric, 3) AS kWh_per_ora
FROM consumo_orario
GROUP BY ora
ORDER BY ora::int;

WITH ultimo AS (
  SELECT MAX(timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_max FROM Rilevamento
),
dati AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento,
    watt_rilevati,
    LEAD(timestamp_rilevamento) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_next,
    LEAD(watt_rilevati) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS watt_next
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE timestamp_rilevamento >= date_trunc('month', (SELECT ts_max FROM ultimo))
)
SELECT
  ROUND(
    SUM(
      (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ts_next - timestamp_rilevamento)) / 3600)
      * ((watt_rilevati + watt_next) / 2) / 1000
    )::NUMERIC, 3
  ) AS kWh_mese
FROM dati
WHERE ts_next IS NOT NULL;

WITH ultimo AS (
  SELECT MAX(timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_max FROM Rilevamento
),
dati AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento,
    watt_rilevati,
    LEAD(timestamp_rilevamento) OVER (
      PARTITION BY DATE(timestamp_rilevamento)
      ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento
    ) AS ts_next,
    LEAD(watt_rilevati) OVER (
      PARTITION BY DATE(timestamp_rilevamento)
      ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento
    ) AS watt_next,
    (SELECT date_trunc('month', ts_max) FROM ultimo) AS inizio_mese
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE timestamp_rilevamento >= (SELECT date_trunc('month', ts_max) FROM ultimo)
)
SELECT
  DATE(timestamp_rilevamento) AS giorno,
  ROUND(SUM(
    (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ts_next - timestamp_rilevamento)) / 3600)
    * ((watt_rilevati + watt_next) / 2) / 1000
  )::NUMERIC, 3) AS kWh_giornalieri
FROM dati
WHERE ts_next IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY giorno
ORDER BY giorno;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(ABS(ampere_rilevati)) AS "Ufficio 1 A max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 1
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN 
    ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') AND 
    ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  ABS(AVG(ampere_rilevati)) AS "I1 avg",
  ABS(MAX(ampere_rilevati)) AS "I1 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 1
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

SELECT
  MAX(ABS(volt_rilevati)) AS "Ufficio 1 Vmax"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 1
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  ABS(AVG(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 1 THEN volt_rilevati END)) AS "V1 avg",
  ABS(MAX(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 1 THEN volt_rilevati END)) AS "V1 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  AND codice_sensore = 1
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(ABS(ampere_rilevati)) AS "Magazzino A max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 2
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN
    ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') AND
    ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  ABS(AVG(ampere_rilevati)) AS "I2 avg",
  ABS(MAX(ampere_rilevati)) AS "I2 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 2
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

SELECT
  MAX(ABS(volt_rilevati)) AS "Magazzino Vmax"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 2
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  ABS(AVG(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 2 THEN volt_rilevati END)) AS "V2 avg",
  ABS(MAX(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 2 THEN volt_rilevati END)) AS "V2 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  AND codice_sensore = 2
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(ABS(ampere_rilevati)) AS "Laboratorio Amax"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 3
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN 
    ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') AND 
    ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  ABS(AVG(ampere_rilevati)) AS "I3 avg",
  ABS(MAX(ampere_rilevati)) AS "I3 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 3
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

SELECT
  MAX(ABS(volt_rilevati)) AS "Laboratorio Vmax"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 3
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  ABS(AVG(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 3 THEN volt_rilevati END)) AS "V3 avg",
  ABS(MAX(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 3 THEN volt_rilevati END)) AS "V3 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                               AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  AND codice_sensore = 3
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

WITH intervallo AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento,
    codice_sensore,
    watt_rilevati,
    LEAD(timestamp_rilevamento) OVER (PARTITION BY codice_sensore ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento) AS ts_next
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE timestamp_rilevamento > ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 hour')
    AND timestamp_rilevamento < ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '1 hour')
    AND codice_sensore IN (1, 2, 3)
),
energia_per_fase AS (
  SELECT
    codice_sensore,
    SUM(
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ts_next - timestamp_rilevamento))/3600 * watt_rilevati / 1000
    ) AS energia_kwh
  FROM intervallo
  WHERE ts_next IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY codice_sensore
),
totale AS (
  SELECT SUM(energia_kwh) AS energia_totale FROM energia_per_fase
)
SELECT
  100 * COALESCE((SELECT energia_kwh FROM energia_per_fase WHERE codice_sensore = 1), 0) / NULLIF((SELECT energia_totale FROM totale),0) AS "Ufficio 1",
  100 * COALESCE((SELECT energia_kwh FROM energia_per_fase WHERE codice_sensore = 2), 0) / NULLIF((SELECT energia_totale FROM totale),0) AS "Magazzino",
  100 * COALESCE((SELECT energia_kwh FROM energia_per_fase WHERE codice_sensore = 3), 0) / NULLIF((SELECT energia_totale FROM totale),0) AS "Laboratorio";

SELECT 
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 1 THEN watt_rilevati ELSE NULL END) AS "Ufficio 1",
  MAX(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 2 THEN watt_rilevati ELSE NULL END) AS "Magazzino",
  MAX(CASE WHEN codice_sensore = 3 THEN watt_rilevati ELSE NULL END) AS "Laboratorio"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  AND codice_sensore IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento ASC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(watt_rilevati) AS "Ufficio 1 max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 1
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') 
                             AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

WITH intervallo AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento AS ts
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                                AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
),
ufficio1 AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
    MAX(watt_rilevati) AS ufficio1
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE codice_sensore = 1
    AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                                AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
),
magazzino AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
    MAX(watt_rilevati) AS magazzino
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE codice_sensore = 2
    AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                                AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
),
laboratorio AS (
  SELECT
    timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
    MAX(watt_rilevati) AS laboratorio
  FROM Rilevamento
  WHERE codice_sensore = 3
    AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes')
                                AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
  GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
)
SELECT
  i.ts,
  COALESCE(ufficio1.ufficio1, 0) AS "Ufficio 1",
  COALESCE(magazzino.magazzino, 0) AS "Magazzino",
  COALESCE(laboratorio.laboratorio, 0) AS "Laboratorio"
FROM intervallo i
LEFT JOIN ufficio1 ON i.ts = ufficio1.ts
LEFT JOIN magazzino ON i.ts = magazzino.ts
LEFT JOIN laboratorio ON i.ts = laboratorio.ts
ORDER BY i.ts ASC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(watt_rilevati) AS "Magazzino max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 2
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') 
                             AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;

SELECT
  timestamp_rilevamento AS ts,
  MAX(watt_rilevati) AS "Laboratorio max"
FROM Rilevamento
WHERE codice_sensore = 3
  AND timestamp_rilevamento BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '15 minutes') 
                             AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp + INTERVAL '15 minutes')
GROUP BY timestamp_rilevamento
ORDER BY timestamp_rilevamento DESC;
